author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Coloplast Launches Share Buy-Back Programme
text:
Feb 20 (Reuters) - COLOPLAST:
* REG-ANNOUNCEMENT NO. 3/2018 - SHARE BUYBACK PROGRAMME
* IS LAUNCHING A SHARE BUY-BACK PROGRAMME OF UP TO DKK 1BN.
* ‍FIRST PART OF PROGRAMME, OF DKK 500M, EXPECTED TO TAKE PLACE DURING PERIOD FROM 26 FEB 2018 TO 25 AUG 2018​
* SECOND PART OF DKK 500M IS EXPECTED TO COMMENCE IN Q2 2018/19 AND BE COMPLETED BEFORE FINANCIAL YEAR END 2018/19 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
